title: The new ranked login screen is very cool

embed.description: Imaqtpie on christmas day - Clipped by mrcars

body:
So as you may know, there is a lot of critic and doubts about the new ranked system going on NA/Korea atm.

But I just saw the new login screen people get in ranked (I linked QTPie twitch clip for that) and... GOD IT LOOK GOOD.
AND SO SMOOTH?
The fuck?

Like it really feel good to look at, the borders are very pretty, it doesn't feel as raw as it was before and I think the best way to word it for me is that you modernised it while making very aesthically pleasing (The police, the tones for the borders colours, the smoothness when you click on people profile or hover their runes).

Good job guys! Keep that for sure!

replies.body: I wannna  know why we  dont see it here yet is there a reason for it ?
It's a massive improvement if you hate information, yes.
